name: Solitaire 1000
description:
* Our solitaire app series reached 4 million downloads! *

PRO.APP famous for solitaire released new game which Solitaire 1000!

This app will change waste of time to refreshing time or training your brain time.
So, we highly recommend download this app.

You can play solitaire in very short time, and you feels good to win the game.

In generally, you can or can not win is depend on distributed cards in solitaire.
Solitaire 1000 includes deals are all winnable.


[1] We selected deals which are winnable!

[2] Game included 4 type of klondike which is most popular in solitaire.

[3] Each game include 1000 deals.

[4] All deals has example answer for beginner.

[5] Compete with others each stage through the ranking for advanced user!

[6] Everyone have fun to get clear awards.

[7] It's free of charge. Let's play now!

* Inquiry
- If you have any questions or report bug, please contact us by email from
information page. We will answer individually.
- And, we will make an effort of our product,
so please give us your feedback on product usage.

PRO Corp.
